content.question: The depiction of the scene in the engraving best illustrates which of the following aspects of the French aristocracy under Louis XIV’s rule?

choices.label: The maintenance of the aristocracy’s privileged social position
The financial difficulties experienced by many members of the aristocracy in attempting to support their lifestyle
The displacement of the aristocracy from many key administrative posts
The continued rivalries among aristocratic factions seeking royal favor

content.answer: The maintenance of the aristocracy’s privileged social position

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
